title: I want to earn 5000 a month. What should I do? - Quora

There are many options. The most common are the sites where you get money for clicking on ads, filling forms, completing surveys, offers, etc. But these methods hardly earn you 1000 a month. I would advice you to start blogging or YouTubing on something you are good at. For example, if you are good at computers, start blogging on that! Or if you like to cook and create new dishes, create a food blog. Or you could make a YouTube channel on computers. You can give tutorials and reviewing electronics and what not. Or start a food channel on YouTube where you show people what you cooked and how and the recipe. I would recommend these two - blog and YouTube. But it can take months to start earning 5000. If you put a lot of effort and interest you can become a millionaire. Many YouTubers make millions and their job is YouTube. You can also start working if you have a degree. That way you can easily get more than 5000. You can contact me thru Quora if you want more tips on Blogging and YouTube and how to earn money thru it.
